mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_SPSINFSGMT (SPSINFSGMTSEQNO, MARISTATUS, SPONAME, SPOIDTYPE, SPOIDNUM, SPOTEL, SPSCMPYNM, SPSINFOUPDATE, REPORTFLAG ) values (#{SpsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MariStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SpoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SpoIDType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SpoIDNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SpoTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SpsCmpyNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SpsInfoUpDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into PBCRS_REPORT_SPSINFSGMTM (SPSINFSGMTSEQNO, MARISTATUS, SPONAME, SPOIDTYPE, SPOIDNUM, SPOTEL, SPSCMPYNM, SPSINFOUPDATE, REPORTFLAG, ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS ) select SPSINFSGMTSEQNO, MARISTATUS, SPONAME, SPOIDTYPE, SPOIDNUM, SPOTEL, SPSCMPYNM, SPSINFOUPDATE, '0', ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS from PBCRS_REPORT_SPSINFSGMT where SPSINFSGMTSEQNO = #{SpsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_SPSINFSGMT set MARISTATUS = #{MariStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPONAME = #{SpoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPOIDTYPE = #{SpoIDType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPOIDNUM = #{SpoIDNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPOTEL = #{SpoTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPSCMPYNM = #{SpsCmpyNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPSINFOUPDATE = #{SpsInfoUpDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORTFLAG = #{reportflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SPSINFSGMTSEQNO = #{SpsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SPSINFSGMTSEQNO, MARISTATUS, SPONAME, SPOIDTYPE, SPOIDNUM, SPOTEL, SPSCMPYNM, SPSINFOUPDATE, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_SPSINFSGMT where SPSINFSGMTSEQNO = #{SpsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SPSINFSGMTSEQNO, MARISTATUS, SPONAME, SPOIDTYPE, SPOIDNUM, SPOTEL, SPSCMPYNM, SPSINFOUPDATE, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_SPSINFSGMT
